node.excerpt:
Figure out how to setup a preview instance of your Gatsby site using the Contentful Preview API
and authenticate it using Netlify Identity with Google OAuth.

frontmatter.title: Creating an authenticated preview site for Gatsby and Contentful using Netlify Identity

node.excerpt:
Yes, this is yet another blog post about some random internet users'
favourite VS Code extensions.

The aim of this post is to provide instructions for setting up a "Getting Things Done (GTD)"-style workflow using Notion. It does _not_ cover the workflow itself; it only covers how to setup the necessary views within Notion.
